name: BDCKProtocol
summary: A simple set of protocols that help getting started with CloudKit.
description:
A simple set of protocols that help getting started with CloudKit.
The protocols help define a data model to be a local version of CloudKit's record.
Using these protocols to keep data models up-to-date with the records in the database.
